name: Sample Frontline Web Server Application
description: This application is a sample Frontline web application servering JSON data.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio account SID. You view it here: https://console.twilio.com

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio account auth token. You view it here: https://console.twilio.com

TWILIO_SMS_NUMBER.description: Your Twilio phone number used to send and receive messages.

TWILIO_WHATSAPP_NUMBER.description: Your Twilio WhatsApp sender id (Twilio phone number) used to send and receive messages.

TWILIO_SSO_REALM_SID.description: Conversation service SID. You can view it here: https://console.twilio.com/us1/develop/frontline/manage/single-sign-on?frameUrl=%2Fconsole%2Ffrontline%2Fsso%3Fx-target-region%3Dus1
